txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Matted feathers from the hendrevail in Ered Luin. Collect them and deliver them to Dorri at Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
'Now, these are crusty looking things...not much use of these other than knowing that the Dourhands cannot call on these allies any longer.\n\n'Your efforts will echo through the halls.'
'Clipping wings and claiming feathers means that the Dourhands will lose allies, and when they lose allies, the Longbeards profit.'
Dorri wants matted feathers. Dorri can be found standing at the west gate of Gondamon.
Deliver the matted feathers to Dorri at Gondamon
You have accepted a task to acquire matted feathers. You are to deliver them to Dorri at the western gate of Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
Wanted: Matted feathers from the hendrevail in Ered Luin.
